name: Ass Savers Mudguard Regular
description: Keep road spray from soaking your back. Clip this mini-shield to your saddle rails to foil mud and water. Sleek, lightweight style is designed for road bikes.Made of 100% recyclable 0.8 mm thick polypropylene.Clips to saddle rails, no tools required to install.Flip-Tip locks this lightweight fender into place.Designed for tires width 23 to 35mm.Length is 38cm from tip to tail.
